channel.title: GetHooks for Windows x86 2k/XP/Vista/7/8
channel.description: GetHooks is a program designed for the passive detection and monitoring of hooks from a limited user account.

item.title: GetHooks v1.1 released
item.description:
GetHooks v1.1 released on December 14, 2011

Changes:

    * Fixed failure to start on some XP and PE operating systems.
item.author: Jay Satiro
